name: Intellectual Property Lawyers' Association
headAddress: c/o M Burdon, Simmons & Simmons LLP
goal: To keep under review the law, court procedure and practice relating to patents, trade marks, registered designs, copyright in drawings capable of industrial application whether registrable or not, trade secrets, designs, unfair competition and passing-off: and to make representations and to offer assistance or recommendations to relevant government and regulatory bodies.
interests: Borders and Security, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: all initiatives, policies and legislation, enquiries and decisions regarding any form of intellectual proprty law - patents, trade marks, registered designs, copyright in drawings capable of industrial application whether registrable or not, trade secrets, designs, unfair competition and passing-off
